# uxi_agent (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the agent.

### Optional

- `notes` (String) The notes of the agent.
- `pcap_mode` (String) The packet capture mode of the agent.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The identifier of the agent.
